title: 1.9的命令方块怎么制作自定义怪物
txt_content: 要能自定义掉落（有标签），自定义属性，自定义头颅。会的大神发个例子，谢谢！

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"我是自定义名字",
CustomNameVisible:1,Glowing:1,Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:最大生命},{Name:"g
eneric.followRange",Base:探测范围},{Name:"generic.movementSpeed",Base:移动速度f},{Name:"generic.attackDamage",Base
:攻击伤害},{Name:"zombie.spawnReinforcements",Base:0.33f}],ArmorItems:[{鞋子},{裤子},{衣服},{id:"minecraft:leather_helm
et",tag:{display:{color:1875981,Name:"绿帽子",Lore:["说明"]},ench:[{id:0,lvl:4}]}}],Team:blue}

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2016-5-28 13:02
/summon Zombie ~ ~1 ~ {CustomName:"我是自定义名字",
CustomNameVisible:1,Glowing:1,Attributes:[{Name: ...

replies.author: Lucky_fish0w0
replies.txt_content:
summon EntityType x y z {Attributes:[{Name:"generic.maxHealth",Base:xx.xxd},..],ArmorItems:[{..},{..},{..},{id:"minecraft:skull",Damage:3s,tag:{SkullOwner:"...",...}}],ArmorDropChances:[..f,..f,..f,0.0f],...}复制代码
...皆为可充实的内容，根据实际情况而定
推荐你看看这个[url=http://minecraft-zh.gamepedia.com/Player.dat格式]还有这个
